messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the link, Karol. I'm slower than i think!!
I'll have to see how my girls like it
Debra
----- Original Message -----
From: "Karol Gale" <kgale@...>
To: <unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2000 3:10 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Puzzles and more puzzles


> From: Karol Gale <kgale@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> I just received this really neat Site from a cousin tonight. It
> would be great for the kids - especially those who are into doing
> puzzles. I love to do puzzles and did three of these immediately.
> You can work them as regular puzzle pieces, or choose a variety
> of different types of shapes and the number of pieces - making
> it more and more difficult!!!
>
> It will time you. So, you can challenge others to beat your time,
> etc.
>
> Sounds like a lot of fun for you puzzle enthusiasts.
>
>
> http://jigzone.com
>
> Have fun!!!
>
> Karol
> ---an Unschooling Grandma---

messages.subject: Puzzles and more puzzles
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I just received this really neat Site from a cousin tonight.  It would be great for the kids - especially those who are into doing puzzles.  I love to do
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I just received this really neat Site from a cousin tonight. It
would be great for the kids - especially those who are into doing
puzzles. I love to do puzzles and did three of these immediately.
You can work them as regular puzzle pieces, or choose a variety
of different types of shapes and the number of pieces - making
it more and more difficult!!!

It will time you. So, you can challenge others to beat your time,
etc.

Sounds like a lot of fun for you puzzle enthusiasts.


http://jigzone.com

Have fun!!!

Karol
---an Unschooling Grandma---
